name: anonaddy
description: AnonAddy is an email aliasing service that helps you protect your real email. It supports encrypted forwarding, multiple domains, custom subdomains, and can be fully self-hosted as a privacy-focused alternative to commercial aliasing tools.
features: Email Aliasing: Create unlimited aliases to protect your real email address. Hide your identity.
Encrypted Forwarding: Emails forwarded with PGP encryption support. Secure communication.
Multiple Domains: Use your own domains for professional-looking aliases. Brand your privacy.
Custom Subdomains: Create organized alias structures with subdomains. Systematic organization.
Reply Anonymously: Respond to emails while keeping your real address hidden. Two-way privacy.
Alias Control: Enable, disable, or delete aliases anytime instantly. Complete flexibility.
Self-Hosted: Full privacy with your own server deployment. No third-party access.
Browser Extension: Generate aliases on the fly while browsing. Instant protection.
